from .basesdk import BaseSDK
from books import models, utils

from books.types import BaseModel, OptionalNullable, UNSET
from books.utils import get_security_from_env
from typing import List, Optional, Union, cast


class API(BaseSDK):
    def api_books_list(
        self,
        *,
        security: Optional[
            Union[models.APIBooksListSecurity, models.APIBooksListSecurityTypedDict]
        ] = None,
        retries: OptionalNullable[utils.RetryConfig] = UNSET,
        server_url: Optional[str] = None,
        timeout_ms: Optional[int] = None,
    ) -> List[models.Book]:
        r"""
        :param security:
        :param retries: Override the default retry configuration for this method
        :param server_url: Override the default server URL for this method
        :param timeout_ms: Override the default request timeout configuration for this method in milliseconds
        """
        base_url = None
        url_variables = None
        if timeout_ms is None:
            timeout_ms = self.sdk_configuration.timeout_ms

        if server_url is not None:
            base_url = server_url
        req = self.build_request(
            method="GET",
            path="/api/books/",
            base_url=base_url,
            url_variables=url_variables,
            request=None,
            request_body_required=False,
            request_has_path_params=False,
            request_has_query_params=True,
            user_agent_header="user-agent",
            accept_header_value="application/json",
            security=utils.get_pydantic_model(
                security, Optional[models.APIBooksListSecurity]
            ),
            timeout_ms=timeout_ms,
        )

        if retries == UNSET:
            if self.sdk_configuration.retry_config is not UNSET:
                retries = self.sdk_configuration.retry_config

        retry_config = None
        if isinstance(retries, utils.RetryConfig):
            retry_config = (retries, ["429", "500", "502", "503", "504"])

        http_res = self.do_request(
            hook_ctx=HookContext(
                operation_id="api_books_list",
                oauth2_scopes=[],
                security_source=get_security_from_env(security, models.Security),
            ),
            request=req,
            error_status_codes=["4XX", "5XX"],
            retry_config=retry_config,
        )

        if utils.match_response(http_res, "200", "application/json"):
            return utils.unmarshal_json(http_res.text, List[models.Book])
        if utils.match_response(http_res, ["4XX", "5XX"], "*"):
            http_res_text = utils.stream_to_text(http_res)
            raise models.SDKError(
                "API error occurred", http_res.status_code, http_res_text, http_res
            )

        content_type = http_res.headers.get("Content-Type")
        http_res_text = utils.stream_to_text(http_res)
        raise models.SDKError(
            f"Unexpected response received (code: {http_res.status_code}, type: {content_type})",
            http_res.status_code,
            http_res_text,
            http_res,
        )

    def api_books_create(
        self,
        *,
        request: Union[models.BookInput, models.BookInputTypedDict],
        security: Optional[
            Union[models.APIBooksCreateSecurity, models.APIBooksCreateSecurityTypedDict]
        ] = None,
        retries: OptionalNullable[utils.RetryConfig] = UNSET,
        server_url: Optional[str] = None,
        timeout_ms: Optional[int] = None,
    ) -> models.Book:
        r"""
        :param request: The request object to send.
        :param security:
        :param retries: Override the default retry configuration for this method
        :param server_url: Override the default server URL for this method
        :param timeout_ms: Override the default request timeout configuration for this method in milliseconds
        """
        base_url = None
        url_variables = None
        if timeout_ms is None:
            timeout_ms = self.sdk_configuration.timeout_ms

        if server_url is not None:
            base_url = server_url

        if not isinstance(request, BaseModel):
            request = utils.unmarshal(request, models.BookInput)
        request = cast(models.BookInput, request)

        req = self.build_request(
            method="POST",
            path="/api/books/",
            base_url=base_url,
            url_variables=url_variables,
            request=request,
            request_body_required=True,
            request_has_path_params=False,
            request_has_query_params=True,
            user_agent_header="user-agent",
            accept_header_value="application/json",
            security=utils.get_pydantic_model(
                security, Optional[models.APIBooksCreateSecurity]
            ),
            get_serialized_body=lambda: utils.serialize_request_body(
                request, False, False, "json", models.BookInput
            ),
            timeout_ms=timeout_ms,
        )

        if retries == UNSET:
            if self.sdk_configuration.retry_config is not UNSET:
                retries = self.sdk_configuration.retry_config

        retry_config = None
        if isinstance(retries, utils.RetryConfig):
            retry_config = (retries, ["429", "500", "502", "503", "504"])

        http_res = self.do_request(
            hook_ctx=HookContext(
                operation_id="api_books_create",
                oauth2_scopes=[],
                security_source=get_security_from_env(security, models.Security),
            ),
            request=req,
            error_status_codes=["4XX", "5XX"],
            retry_config=retry_config,
        )

        if utils.match_response(http_res, "201", "application/json"):
            return utils.unmarshal_json(http_res.text, models.Book)
        if utils.match_response(http_res, ["4XX", "5XX"], "*"):
            http_res_text = utils.stream_to_text(http_res)

        self,
        *,
        id: int,
        security: Optional[
            Union[
                models.APIBooksRetrieveSecurity,
                models.APIBooksRetrieveSecurityTypedDict,
            ]
        ] = None,
        retries: OptionalNullable[utils.RetryConfig] = UNSET,
        server_url: Optional[str] = None,
        timeout_ms: Optional[int] = None,
    ) -> models.Book:
        r"""

    async def api_books_retrieve_async(
        self,
        *,
        id: int,
        security: Optional[
            Union[
                models.APIBooksRetrieveSecurity,
                models.APIBooksRetrieveSecurityTypedDict,
            ]
        ] = None,
        retries: OptionalNullable[utils.RetryConfig] = UNSET,
        server_url: Optional[str] = None,
        timeout_ms: Optional[int] = None,
    ) -> models.Book:
        r"""
        :param id: A unique integer value identifying this book.
        :param security:
        :param retries: Override the default retry configuration for this method
        :param server_url: Override the default server URL for this method
        :param timeout_ms: Override the default request timeout configuration for this method in milliseconds

        base_url = None
        url_variables = None

            timeout_ms = self.sdk_configuration.timeout_ms

            base_url = server_url

        request = models.APIBooksRetrieveRequest(
            id=id,
        )

            method="GET",

            request_has_path_params=True,
            request_has_query_params=True,

                security, Optional[models.APIBooksRetrieveSecurity]

        )

                retries = self.sdk_configuration.retry_config

        retry_config = None
        if isinstance(retries, utils.RetryConfig):
            retry_config = (retries, ["429", "500", "502", "503", "504"])

        http_res = await self.do_request_async(
            hook_ctx=HookContext(
                operation_id="api_books_retrieve",

                security_source=get_security_from_env(security, models.Security),
            ),
            request=req,
            error_status_codes=["4XX", "5XX"],
            retry_config=retry_config,
        )

            return utils.unmarshal_json(http_res.text, models.Book)
        if utils.match_response(http_res, ["4XX", "5XX"], "*"):

            f"Unexpected response received (code: {http_res.status_code}, type: {content_type})",
            http_res.status_code,

            http_res,
        )

    def api_books_update(
        self,
        *,
        id: int,
        book: Union[models.BookInput, models.BookInputTypedDict],
        security: Optional[
            Union[models.APIBooksUpdateSecurity, models.APIBooksUpdateSecurityTypedDict]
        ] = None,
        retries: OptionalNullable[utils.RetryConfig] = UNSET,
        server_url: Optional[str] = None,
        timeout_ms: Optional[int] = None,
    ) -> models.Book:
        r"""
        :param id: A unique integer value identifying this book.
        :param book:
        :param security:
        :param retries: Override the default retry configuration for this method
        :param server_url: Override the default server URL for this method
        :param timeout_ms: Override the default request timeout configuration for this method in milliseconds
        """
        base_url = None
        url_variables = None
        if timeout_ms is None:
            timeout_ms = self.sdk_configuration.timeout_ms

        if server_url is not None:
            base_url = server_url

        request = models.APIBooksUpdateRequest(
            id=id,
            book=utils.get_pydantic_model(book, models.BookInput),
        )

        req = self.build_request(
            method="PUT",
            path="/api/books/{id}/",
            base_url=base_url,
            url_variables=url_variables,
            request=request,
            request_body_required=True,
            request_has_path_params=True,
            request_has_query_params=True,
            user_agent_header="user-agent",
            accept_header_value="application/json",
            security=utils.get_pydantic_model(
                security, Optional[models.APIBooksUpdateSecurity]
            ),
            get_serialized_body=lambda: utils.serialize_request_body(
                request.book, False, False, "json", models.BookInput
            ),
            timeout_ms=timeout_ms,
        )

        if retries == UNSET:
            if self.sdk_configuration.retry_config is not UNSET:
                retries = self.sdk_configuration.retry_config

        retry_config = None
        if isinstance(retries, utils.RetryConfig):
            retry_config = (retries, ["429", "500", "502", "503", "504"])

        http_res = self.do_request(
            hook_ctx=HookContext(
                operation_id="api_books_update",
                oauth2_scopes=[],
                security_source=get_security_from_env(security, models.Security),
            ),
            request=req,
            error_status_codes=["4XX", "5XX"],
            retry_config=retry_config,
        )

        if utils.match_response(http_res, "200", "application/json"):
            return utils.unmarshal_json(http_res.text, models.Book)
        if utils.match_response(http_res, ["4XX", "5XX"], "*"):
            http_res_text = utils.stream_to_text(http_res)
            raise models.SDKError(
                "API error occurred", http_res.status_code, http_res_text, http_res
            )

        content_type = http_res.headers.get("Content-Type")
        http_res_text = utils.stream_to_text(http_res)
        raise models.SDKError(
            f"Unexpected response received (code: {http_res.status_code}, type: {content_type})",
            http_res.status_code,
            http_res_text,
            http_res,
        )

    async def api_books_update_async(
        self,
        *,
        id: int,
        book: Union[models.BookInput, models.BookInputTypedDict],
        security: Optional[
            Union[models.APIBooksUpdateSecurity, models.APIBooksUpdateSecurityTypedDict]
        ] = None,
        retries: OptionalNullable[utils.RetryConfig] = UNSET,
        server_url: Optional[str] = None,
        timeout_ms: Optional[int] = None,
    ) -> models.Book:
        r"""
        :param id: A unique integer value identifying this book.
        :param book:
        :param security:
        :param retries: Override the default retry configuration for this method
        :param server_url: Override the default server URL for this method
        :param timeout_ms: Override the default request timeout configuration for this method in milliseconds
        """
        base_url = None
        url_variables = None
        if timeout_ms is None:
            timeout_ms = self.sdk_configuration.timeout_ms

        if server_url is not None:
            base_url = server_url

        request = models.APIBooksUpdateRequest(
            id=id,
            book=utils.get_pydantic_model(book, models.BookInput),
        )

        req = self.build_request_async(
            method="PUT",
            path="/api/books/{id}/",
            base_url=base_url,
            url_variables=url_variables,
            request=request,
            request_body_required=True,
            request_has_path_params=True,
            request_has_query_params=True,
            user_agent_header="user-agent",
            accept_header_value="application/json",
            security=utils.get_pydantic_model(
                security, Optional[models.APIBooksUpdateSecurity]
            ),
            get_serialized_body=lambda: utils.serialize_request_body(
                request.book, False, False, "json", models.BookInput
            ),
            timeout_ms=timeout_ms,
        )

        if retries == UNSET:
            if self.sdk_configuration.retry_config is not UNSET:
                retries = self.sdk_configuration.retry_config

        retry_config = None
        if isinstance(retries, utils.RetryConfig):
            retry_config = (retries, ["429", "500", "502", "503", "504"])

        http_res = await self.do_request_async(
            hook_ctx=HookContext(
                operation_id="api_books_update",
                oauth2_scopes=[],
                security_source=get_security_from_env(security, models.Security),
            ),
            request=req,
            error_status_codes=["4XX", "5XX"],
            retry_config=retry_config,
        )

        if utils.match_response(http_res, "200", "application/json"):
            return utils.unmarshal_json(http_res.text, models.Book)
        if utils.match_response(http_res, ["4XX", "5XX"], "*"):
            http_res_text = await utils.stream_to_text_async(http_res)
            raise models.SDKError(
                "API error occurred", http_res.status_code, http_res_text, http_res
            )

        content_type = http_res.headers.get("Content-Type")
        http_res_text = await utils.stream_to_text_async(http_res)
        raise models.SDKError(
            f"Unexpected response received (code: {http_res.status_code}, type: {content_type})",
            http_res.status_code,
            http_res_text,
            http_res,
        )

    def api_books_partial_update(
        self,
        *,
        id: int,
        patched_book: Optional[
            Union[models.PatchedBook, models.PatchedBookTypedDict]
        ] = None,
        security: Optional[
            Union[
                models.APIBooksPartialUpdateSecurity,
                models.APIBooksPartialUpdateSecurityTypedDict,
            ]
        ] = None,
        retries: OptionalNullable[utils.RetryConfig] = UNSET,
        server_url: Optional[str] = None,
        timeout_ms: Optional[int] = None,
    ) -> models.Book:
        r"""
        :param id: A unique integer value identifying this book.
        :param patched_book:
        :param security:
        :param retries: Override the default retry configuration for this method
        :param server_url: Override the default server URL for this method
        :param timeout_ms: Override the default request timeout configuration for this method in milliseconds
        """
        base_url = None
        url_variables = None
        if timeout_ms is None:
            timeout_ms = self.sdk_configuration.timeout_ms

        if server_url is not None:
            base_url = server_url

        request = models.APIBooksPartialUpdateRequest(
            id=id,
            patched_book=utils.get_pydantic_model(
                patched_book, Optional[models.PatchedBook]
            ),
        )

        req = self.build_request(
            method="PATCH",
            path="/api/books/{id}/",
            base_url=base_url,
            url_variables=url_variables,
            request=request,
            request_body_required=False,
            request_has_path_params=True,
            request_has_query_params=True,
            user_agent_header="user-agent",
            accept_header_value="application/json",
            security=utils.get_pydantic_model(
                security, Optional[models.APIBooksPartialUpdateSecurity]
            ),
            get_serialized_body=lambda: utils.serialize_request_body(
                request.patched_book, False, True, "json", Optional[models.PatchedBook]
            ),
            timeout_ms=timeout_ms,
        )

        if retries == UNSET:
            if self.sdk_configuration.retry_config is not UNSET:
                retries = self.sdk_configuration.retry_config

        retry_config = None
        if isinstance(retries, utils.RetryConfig):
            retry_config = (retries, ["429", "500", "502", "503", "504"])

        http_res = self.do_request(
            hook_ctx=HookContext(
                operation_id="api_books_partial_update",
                oauth2_scopes=[],
                security_source=get_security_from_env(security, models.Security),
            ),
            request=req,
            error_status_codes=["4XX", "5XX"],
            retry_config=retry_config,
        )

        if utils.match_response(http_res, "200", "application/json"):
            return utils.unmarshal_json(http_res.text, models.Book)
        if utils.match_response(http_res, ["4XX", "5XX"], "*"):
            http_res_text = utils.stream_to_text(http_res)
            raise models.SDKError(
                "API error occurred", http_res.status_code, http_res_text, http_res
            )

        content_type = http_res.headers.get("Content-Type")
        http_res_text = utils.stream_to_text(http_res)
        raise models.SDKError(
            f"Unexpected response received (code: {http_res.status_code}, type: {content_type})",
            http_res.status_code,
            http_res_text,
            http_res,
        )

    async def api_books_partial_update_async(
        self,
        *,
        id: int,
        patched_book: Optional[
            Union[models.PatchedBook, models.PatchedBookTypedDict]
        ] = None,
        security: Optional[
            Union[
                models.APIBooksPartialUpdateSecurity,
                models.APIBooksPartialUpdateSecurityTypedDict,
            ]
        ] = None,
        retries: OptionalNullable[utils.RetryConfig] = UNSET,
        server_url: Optional[str] = None,
        timeout_ms: Optional[int] = None,
    ) -> models.Book:
        r"""
        :param id: A unique integer value identifying this book.
        :param patched_book:
        :param security:
        :param retries: Override the default retry configuration for this method
        :param server_url: Override the default server URL for this method
        :param timeout_ms: Override the default request timeout configuration for this method in milliseconds
        """
        base_url = None
        url_variables = None
        if timeout_ms is None:
            timeout_ms = self.sdk_configuration.timeout_ms

        if server_url is not None:
            base_url = server_url

        request = models.APIBooksPartialUpdateRequest(
            id=id,
            patched_book=utils.get_pydantic_model(
                patched_book, Optional[models.PatchedBook]
            ),
        )

        req = self.build_request_async(
            method="PATCH",
            path="/api/books/{id}/",
            base_url=base_url,
            url_variables=url_variables,
            request=request,
            request_body_required=False,
            request_has_path_params=True,
            request_has_query_params=True,
            user_agent_header="user-agent",
            accept_header_value="application/json",
            security=utils.get_pydantic_model(
                security, Optional[models.APIBooksPartialUpdateSecurity]
            ),
            get_serialized_body=lambda: utils.serialize_request_body(
                request.patched_book, False, True, "json", Optional[models.PatchedBook]
            ),
            timeout_ms=timeout_ms,
        )

        if retries == UNSET:
            if self.sdk_configuration.retry_config is not UNSET:
                retries = self.sdk_configuration.retry_config

        retry_config = None
        if isinstance(retries, utils.RetryConfig):
            retry_config = (retries, ["429", "500", "502", "503", "504"])

        http_res = await self.do_request_async(
            hook_ctx=HookContext(
                operation_id="api_books_partial_update",
                oauth2_scopes=[],
                security_source=get_security_from_env(security, models.Security),
            ),
            request=req,
            error_status_codes=["4XX", "5XX"],
            retry_config=retry_config,
        )

        if utils.match_response(http_res, "200", "application/json"):
            return utils.unmarshal_json(http_res.text, models.Book)
        if utils.match_response(http_res, ["4XX", "5XX"], "*"):
            http_res_text = await utils.stream_to_text_async(http_res)
            raise models.SDKError(
                "API error occurred", http_res.status_code, http_res_text, http_res
            )

        content_type = http_res.headers.get("Content-Type")
        http_res_text = await utils.stream_to_text_async(http_res)
        raise models.SDKError(
            f"Unexpected response received (code: {http_res.status_code}, type: {content_type})",
            http_res.status_code,
            http_res_text,
            http_res,
        )

    def api_books_destroy(
        self,
        *,
        id: int,
        security: Optional[
            Union[
                models.APIBooksDestroySecurity, models.APIBooksDestroySecurityTypedDict
            ]
        ] = None,
        retries: OptionalNullable[utils.RetryConfig] = UNSET,
        server_url: Optional[str] = None,
        timeout_ms: Optional[int] = None,
    ):
        r"""
        :param id: A unique integer value identifying this book.
        :param security:
        :param retries: Override the default retry configuration for this method
        :param server_url: Override the default server URL for this method
        :param timeout_ms: Override the default request timeout configuration for this method in milliseconds
        """
        base_url = None
        url_variables = None
        if timeout_ms is None:
            timeout_ms = self.sdk_configuration.timeout_ms

        if server_url is not None:
            base_url = server_url

        request = models.APIBooksDestroyRequest(
            id=id,
        )

        req = self.build_request(
            method="DELETE",
            path="/api/books/{id}/",
            base_url=base_url,
            url_variables=url_variables,
            request=request,
            request_body_required=False,
            request_has_path_params=True,
            request_has_query_params=True,
            user_agent_header="user-agent",
            accept_header_value="*/*",
            security=utils.get_pydantic_model(
                security, Optional[models.APIBooksDestroySecurity]
            ),
            timeout_ms=timeout_ms,
        )

        if retries == UNSET:
            if self.sdk_configuration.retry_config is not UNSET:
                retries = self.sdk_configuration.retry_config

        retry_config = None
        if isinstance(retries, utils.RetryConfig):
            retry_config = (retries, ["429", "500", "502", "503", "504"])

        http_res = self.do_request(
            hook_ctx=HookContext(
                operation_id="api_books_destroy",
                oauth2_scopes=[],
                security_source=get_security_from_env(security, models.Security),
            ),
            request=req,
            error_status_codes=["4XX", "5XX"],
            retry_config=retry_config,
        )

        if utils.match_response(http_res, "204", "*"):
            return
        if utils.match_response(http_res, ["4XX", "5XX"], "*"):
            http_res_text = utils.stream_to_text(http_res)
            raise models.SDKError(
                "API error occurred", http_res.status_code, http_res_text, http_res
            )

        content_type = http_res.headers.get("Content-Type")
        http_res_text = utils.stream_to_text(http_res)
        raise models.SDKError(
            f"Unexpected response received (code: {http_res.status_code}, type: {content_type})",
            http_res.status_code,
            http_res_text,
            http_res,
        )

    async def api_books_destroy_async(
        self,
        *,
        id: int,
        security: Optional[
            Union[
                models.APIBooksDestroySecurity, models.APIBooksDestroySecurityTypedDict
            ]
        ] = None,
        retries: OptionalNullable[utils.RetryConfig] = UNSET,
        server_url: Optional[str] = None,
        timeout_ms: Optional[int] = None,
    ):
        r"""
        :param id: A unique integer value identifying this book.
        :param security:
        :param retries: Override the default retry configuration for this method
        :param server_url: Override the default server URL for this method
        :param timeout_ms: Override the default request timeout configuration for this method in milliseconds
        """
        base_url = None
        url_variables = None
        if timeout_ms is None:
            timeout_ms = self.sdk_configuration.timeout_ms

        if server_url is not None:
            base_url = server_url

        request = models.APIBooksDestroyRequest(
            id=id,
        )

        req = self.build_request_async(
            method="DELETE",
            path="/api/books/{id}/",
            base_url=base_url,
            url_variables=url_variables,
            request=request,
            request_body_required=False,
            request_has_path_params=True,
            request_has_query_params=True,
            user_agent_header="user-agent",
            accept_header_value="*/*",
            security=utils.get_pydantic_model(
                security, Optional[models.APIBooksDestroySecurity]
            ),
            timeout_ms=timeout_ms,
        )

        if retries == UNSET:
            if self.sdk_configuration.retry_config is not UNSET:
                retries = self.sdk_configuration.retry_config

        retry_config = None
        if isinstance(retries, utils.RetryConfig):
            retry_config = (retries, ["429", "500", "502", "503", "504"])

        http_res = await self.do_request_async(
            hook_ctx=HookContext(
                operation_id="api_books_destroy",
                oauth2_scopes=[],
                security_source=get_security_from_env(security, models.Security),
            ),
            request=req,
            error_status_codes=["4XX", "5XX"],
            retry_config=retry_config,
        )

        if utils.match_response(http_res, "204", "*"):
            return
        if utils.match_response(http_res, ["4XX", "5XX"], "*"):
            http_res_text = await utils.stream_to_text_async(http_res)
            raise models.SDKError(
                "API error occurred", http_res.status_code, http_res_text, http_res
            )

        content_type = http_res.headers.get("Content-Type")
        http_res_text = await utils.stream_to_text_async(http_res)
        raise models.SDKError(
            f"Unexpected response received (code: {http_res.status_code}, type: {content_type})",
            http_res.status_code,
            http_res_text,
            http_res,
        )

    def api_books_author_books_retrieve(
        self,
        *,
        id: int,
        security: Optional[
            Union[
                models.APIBooksAuthorBooksRetrieveSecurity,
                models.APIBooksAuthorBooksRetrieveSecurityTypedDict,
            ]
        ] = None,
        retries: OptionalNullable[utils.RetryConfig] = UNSET,
        server_url: Optional[str] = None,
        timeout_ms: Optional[int] = None,
    ) -> models.Book:
        r"""
        :param id: A unique integer value identifying this book.
        :param security:
        :param retries: Override the default retry configuration for this method
        :param server_url: Override the default server URL for this method
        :param timeout_ms: Override the default request timeout configuration for this method in milliseconds
        """
        base_url = None
        url_variables = None
        if timeout_ms is None:
            timeout_ms = self.sdk_configuration.timeout_ms

        if server_url is not None:
            base_url = server_url

        request = models.APIBooksAuthorBooksRetrieveRequest(
            id=id,
        )

        req = self.build_request(
            method="GET",
            path="/api/books/{id}/author_books/",
            base_url=base_url,
            url_variables=url_variables,
            request=request,
            request_body_required=False,
            request_has_path_params=True,
            request_has_query_params=True,
            user_agent_header="user-agent",
            accept_header_value="application/json",
            security=utils.get_pydantic_model(
                security, Optional[models.APIBooksAuthorBooksRetrieveSecurity]
            ),
            timeout_ms=timeout_ms,
        )

        if retries == UNSET:
            if self.sdk_configuration.retry_config is not UNSET:
                retries = self.sdk_configuration.retry_config

        retry_config = None
        if isinstance(retries, utils.RetryConfig):
            retry_config = (retries, ["429", "500", "502", "503", "504"])

        http_res = self.do_request(
            hook_ctx=HookContext(
                operation_id="api_books_author_books_retrieve",
                oauth2_scopes=[],
                security_source=get_security_from_env(security, models.Security),
            ),
            request=req,
            error_status_codes=["4XX", "5XX"],
            retry_config=retry_config,
        )

        if utils.match_response(http_res, "200", "application/json"):
            return utils.unmarshal_json(http_res.text, models.Book)
        if utils.match_response(http_res, ["4XX", "5XX"], "*"):
            http_res_text = utils.stream_to_text(http_res)
            raise models.SDKError(
                "API error occurred", http_res.status_code, http_res_text, http_res
            )

        content_type = http_res.headers.get("Content-Type")
        http_res_text = utils.stream_to_text(http_res)
        raise models.SDKError(
            f"Unexpected response received (code: {http_res.status_code}, type: {content_type})",
            http_res.status_code,
            http_res_text,
            http_res,
        )

    async def api_books_author_books_retrieve_async(
        self,
        *,
        id: int,
        security: Optional[
            Union[
                models.APIBooksAuthorBooksRetrieveSecurity,
                models.APIBooksAuthorBooksRetrieveSecurityTypedDict,
            ]
        ] = None,
        retries: OptionalNullable[utils.RetryConfig] = UNSET,
        server_url: Optional[str] = None,
        timeout_ms: Optional[int] = None,
    ) -> models.Book:
        r"""
        :param id: A unique integer value identifying this book.
        :param security:
        :param retries: Override the default retry configuration for this method
        :param server_url: Override the default server URL for this method
        :param timeout_ms: Override the default request timeout configuration for this method in milliseconds
        """
        base_url = None
        url_variables = None
        if timeout_ms is None:
            timeout_ms = self.sdk_configuration.timeout_ms

        if server_url is not None:
            base_url = server_url

        request = models.APIBooksAuthorBooksRetrieveRequest(
            id=id,
        )

        req = self.build_request_async(
            method="GET",
            path="/api/books/{id}/author_books/",
            base_url=base_url,
            url_variables=url_variables,
            request=request,
            request_body_required=False,
            request_has_path_params=True,
            request_has_query_params=True,
            user_agent_header="user-agent",
            accept_header_value="application/json",
            security=utils.get_pydantic_model(
                security, Optional[models.APIBooksAuthorBooksRetrieveSecurity]
            ),
            timeout_ms=timeout_ms,
        )

        if retries == UNSET:
            if self.sdk_configuration.retry_config is not UNSET:
                retries = self.sdk_configuration.retry_config

        retry_config = None
        if isinstance(retries, utils.RetryConfig):
            retry_config = (retries, ["429", "500", "502", "503", "504"])

        http_res = await self.do_request_async(
            hook_ctx=HookContext(
                operation_id="api_books_author_books_retrieve",
                oauth2_scopes=[],
                security_source=get_security_from_env(security, models.Security),
            ),
            request=req,
            error_status_codes=["4XX", "5XX"],
            retry_config=retry_config,
        )

        if utils.match_response(http_res, "200", "application/json"):
            return utils.unmarshal_json(http_res.text, models.Book)
        if utils.match_response(http_res, ["4XX", "5XX"], "*"):
            http_res_text = await utils.stream_to_text_async(http_res)
            raise models.SDKError(
                "API error occurred", http_res.status_code, http_res_text, http_res
            )

        content_type = http_res.headers.get("Content-Type")
        http_res_text = await utils.stream_to_text_async(http_res)
        raise models.SDKError(
            f"Unexpected response received (code: {http_res.status_code}, type: {content_type})",
            http_res.status_code,
            http_res_text,
            http_res,
        )
